about.title: About Me
about.text: I am a Web Developer with 4 years of experience from SMK Negeri 1 Cimahi. Currently working as a Backend Web Developer, I have substantial experience in building well-functioning systems with OOP principles, functional programming, RESTful API concepts, SOLID principles, database analysis, and project management using Git. I adapt different architectures based on needs, proficient with NodeJS, and currently learning Go.

techstack.title: Techstack
items: Basic Server Deployment (AWS, Azure, GCP, CI/CD & Kubernetes)

contact.title: Contact

details: Developed Backend for TRACtoGo web and app using Lumen & NodeJS
Collaborated with the team to build TRACtoGo Microservice Backend

Successfully fulfilled user requirements as requested
Developed Crayonpedia Exam web with CodeIgniter, MySQL, Gitlab, and Docker
Managed student data on Crayonpedia Edutainment platform
Supported collaborations with institutions such as courses, certifications, schools, and universities
Conducted platform training for KCD 13 Ciamis
Participated in internship program at Metanouva Informatika

projects.title: Exam Crayonpedia
projects.description: An exam platform for Crayonpedia, featuring Question Bank, Question Analysis, and Answer Review. Includes 5 question types: Multiple Choice, Multi Option, Short Answer, Essay, and Matching. Built with CodeIgniter, MySQL, and Docker as a test environment.

projects.title: TRACtoGo
projects.description: TRACtoGo is a car and bus rental app available on Web, Android, and iOS. Users can choose vehicles with or without a driver. Rental prices depend on the vehicle type, with special promotions available. Built with Laravel Lumen as backend & NodeJS + Typescript as service integration middleware.

projects.title: Lapor.io
projects.description: An online complaint service system project inspired by lapor.go.id. Accepts public complaints and forwards them to relevant authorities. Developed with Laravel, MySQL, and MaterializeCSS.

projects.title: EDZero
projects.description: A portfolio website under development to showcase projects and manage personal blogs and client testimonials. Developed with Laravel, Vue, TailwindCSS, Docker, and PostgreSQL.
